mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM SHOPPING_CART s JOIN ROOM r on s.room_id = r.room_id JOIN CUSTOMER c on s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_CART (room_id, customer_id, adult_count, child_count) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{customerId},#{adultCount},#{childCount})
